text: Big congrats to the @Warriors on winning the 2022 NBA Championship! You’ve made the Bay Area very proud! #DubNation

Today, I joined @HouseDemocrats to pass the bipartisan #LowerFoodAndFuelCostsAct, which will help families by:
✅ Lowering gas prices 
✅ Lowering food prices in the grocery store
✅ Lowering meat & poultry costs

Isabel came to the U.S. in 2003 to receive care for a rare disease and we’ve been advocating for her in Congress since the Trump Administration threatened her and others in her situation with deportation.

This week the House passed a bill I authored that would allow Isabel Bueso to permanently stay in the US so she can keep receiving life-saving medical care not available in her home country, Guatemala. Now I urge the Senate to pass this bill & give Isabel permanent peace of mind. https://t.co/evuDOI6jUo

Previously unseen footage of the attack on the Capitol & new testimony from senior Trump Administration officials further illuminates ex-President Trump’s role in the attempts to overturn the results of the 2020 presidential election.
